title: Paddy Livingston T207 (A on shirt version)
author: Vintagecatcher

posts.post_title: Paddy Livingston T207 (A on shirt version)
posts.post_content:
I'm still hunting for a nice Paddy Livingston T207 (A on shirt version.)

No fewer than 5 have shown up on eBay this past month, but all of the examples have had creases, wrinkles, and paper loss on the front.

I'm looking for a creaseless, clean front example. Will pay strong for one that matches my other 2 Paddy Livingston T207s. I have both big and small "C" examples in EX condition.

Thanks,

Patrick
